disp.mydata=TRUE
mydata.format=site
mydata.ref=cg02162897
pval.threshold=4.720623e-06
disp.association=FALSE
disp.region=FALSE
start=38290160
end=38303219
sample.labels=CpG 
symbols=circle-fill
lab.Y=log
disp.color.ref=TRUE
cormatrix.format=raw
disp.cormatrixmap=TRUE
cormatrix.method=spearman
cormatrix.color.scheme=heat
disp.phys.dist=TRUE
disp.color.bar=TRUE
disp.legend=TRUE
disp.mult.lab.X=FALSE
image.type=pdf
image.title="Example a-DMR in CYP1B1 in Adipose tissue"
image.size=7
genome=hg19
dataset.gene=hsapiens_gene_ensembl
